description: Play on words linking 'fresh prints' to 'Fresh Prince'.
title: Snowy Search
n_1: Fan spots Will Smith in a snowy park.
c1_1: Is that Will Smith over there?
n_2: Fan squints, trying to find Will in the snow.
c1_2: Look at the ground, follow the footprints!
n_3: Will appears, waving at the fan.
c1_4: You gotta look for the 'Fresh Prints'!
c2_4: Oh, I get it now! Clever!
